history.proof: intros n m p H. apply N.gt_lt_iff. qsimpl use: Nmult_gt_compat_l. apply N.gt_lt_iff. apply N.compare_nle_iff. qsimpl use: Nmult_gt_compat_l,N. qsimpl use: Nmult_gt_compat_l,N,Nmult_gt_compat_rev_l1. qsimpl use: Nmult_gt_compat_l,N,Nmult_gt_compat_rev_l1,Ngt_gt_rev. qsimpl use: gt_Ngt,N,Nmult_gt_compat_rev_l1,Ngt_gt_rev,Nmult_gt_compat_l. apply Pos.peano_ind. - srun best use: N.mul_le_mono_l unfold: N.le. - sfirstorder depth: 3. - sfirstorder depth: 3.

original: intros n m p H. apply N.gt_lt_iff. apply Nmult_gt_compat_l. apply N.gt_lt_iff. apply H. apply N.gt_lt. apply Nmult_gt_compat_rev_l1. apply H. apply Ngt_gt_rev. apply gt_Ngt. apply H.
